summary: This document appears to be a quarterly roster or daily assignment log for a corrections officer or staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering the third quarter of 2019. It details shift assignments, including posts like SHU (Special Housing Unit), INTERNAL, and SUICIDE WATCH, with numerous overtime entries. The document is significant as it provides a timeline of staff assignments at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death in August 2019.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as the staff member for whom the daily assignments and quarterly roster are recorded, with numerous overtime shifts logged at MCC New York.

events.title: Suicide Watch Assignment
events.description: Staff member Thomas, M was assigned to SUICIDE WATCH overtime from 01:30 to 08:00 hours.

locations: MCC New York New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for the 3rd quarter of 2019.
The log shows frequent overtime assignments for staff member Thomas, M to posts including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), INTERNAL, and SUICIDE WATCH.
A specific SUICIDE WATCH overtime assignment is recorded for July 23, 2019, which is temporally proximate to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death in August 2019.
The document was filed or accessed on August 19, 2021, as indicated by the timestamp at the end.
